entry.title: Design inspiration - ffffound.com
entry.content: Love how their browsing interface is primary image based. It pivots on user and image, but always pushes you to the next image.

entry.title: Our App is in the App Store!
entry.content:
The last piece of the puzzle slots in. The App is here. http://itun.es/igh4gy

We're phenomenally proud of what we're launching and incredibly excited by what it makes possible.

The months ahead promise to be busy for us. We'll be rolling out some great new features (for sale button, browse by location, public profiles, lost property). Follow our progress here and on http://twitter.com/uioli
